discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Correct D:

https://docs.fortinet.com/document/fortigate/6.2.1/cli-reference/235620/firewall-ssl-ssh-profile

Allow - allow untrusted
Ignore - Change untrusted to trusted

questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit.
//IMG//

A FortiGate is configured for a dial-up IPsec VPN to allow multiple remote FortiGate devices to connect to it. However, FortiGate A and B have problems connecting to the VPN. Only one of them can be connected at a time. If site B tries to connect while site A is connected, site A is disconnected. The IKE real-time debug shows the output in the exhibit when site A is disconnected.
Referring to the exhibit, which configuration setting should be executed in the dial-up configuration to allow both VPNs to be connected at the same time?

discussion.content:
C is wrong as per https://docs.fortinet.com/document/fortigate/6.4.7/cli-reference/356620/config-vpn-ipsec-phase1

Disable peer ID uniqueness enforcement.

keep-new

Enforce peer ID uniqueness, keep new connection if collision found.

keep-old

Enforce peer ID uniqueness, keep old connection if collision found.

Selected Answer: A
A is correct as per https://community.fortinet.com/t5/FortiGate/Technical-Tip-Allowing-multiple-IPSec-dial-up-connection-from/ta-p/198550
There are 3 options:
Action for overlapping routes.
- use-old: Use the old route and do not add the new route.
- use-new: Delete the old route and add the new route.
- allow: Allow overlapping routes.

questions.question_text:
A customer wants to enable SYN flood mitigation in a FortiDDoS device. The FortiDDoS must reply with one SYN/ACK packet per SYN packet from a new source
IP address.
Which SYN flood mitigation mode must the customer use?

choices.B: There are problems with the connection to the Web filter servers, therefore the Web session cannot be categorized.
choices.D: Web filtering is not licensed; therefore, no inspection occurs.
choices.A: The Web session is using QUIC which is not inspected by the FortiGate.
choices.C: The SSL inspection options are not set to deep inspection.

discussion.content:
Correct: A

here: "...notice not all web sessions are being inspected..." so the only and correct is A

Selected Answer: A
Definitey A, B is wrong because there are no connection issues to Fortiguard, C is wrong as web filter do not need deep packet inspection only cert inspection, D is wrong as there is license on FW.

secondary slot 3 - Ch2 slot 3 FPM03 8005 44323

Which URL will accomplish this task?
